DETAILS: MESSAGE TO CEDALION PILOT

<>

Hello Cedalion. Great work on locating Orion. You reported that his optics and motor timgears are non-functional - However the pilot is alive and can still move ORION - So we have adjusted your mission objectives. Your mission is now bring ORION back home. I understand ORION can't see via the optics; But you mentioned you're streaming your systems to him via the T.I.M system? That's smart thinking, Cedalion. Great work. Now... Go and bring him home!

<>

ORION S.R.S is a 3D multiplayer-only action game developed by WindowsYesEdtior in 7 days for the Epic Games' Unreal Engine 4 Epic Megajam. Utilizing the theme "Standing on the shoulders of giants" - WindowsYesEditor took the myth of the blind giant Orion as he is guided home by Cedalion.
